entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
